column4: I'm thinking about getting a Wacom tablet for my wife. She does a lot of photo editing on Ubuntu. Anyone got any reviews or warnings about Wacom tablets with Ubuntu?
last i checked the xorg.conf defaulted to having them configured by default.. :)
you may want to check the forums/google for reviews to see if any of the tablets are a better value then others.
no idea if ALL work. :) ive only used the few low end ones.
